This endpoint follows the pattern `/steps/{stepInstanceId}/comments` for accessing comments as a sub-resource of steps.
If you use an incorrect endpoint pattern, the API will provide helpful error messages with usage guidance.

item.name: Get all master phases with advanced filtering and pagination

request.name: Get all master phases with advanced filtering and pagination

description.content:
Retrieves all master phase templates with comprehensive filtering, pagination, sorting, and computed fields.
Supports Admin GUI with enhanced status metadata, relationship data, and performance optimization.

**Enhanced Features:**
- Computed fields (step_count, instance_count)
- Status metadata with colors and descriptions
- Flexible pagination and sorting
- Advanced filtering by status, owner, date range, and search
- PostgreSQL-optimized queries with proper type casting
Filter by sequence master ID (legacy parameter)
Filter by status name(s). Can be single value or array
Filter by owner team ID (through plan master relationship)
Search in phase name and description

info.name: UMIG API V2
info.description:
[object Object]

## Configuration
This collection is configured with:
- **Base URL**: `{{baseUrl}}` (default: http://localhost:8090/rest/scriptrunner/latest/custom)
- **Authentication**: Basic Auth with username `{{authUsername}}` and password `{{authPassword}}`

The base URL includes the full ScriptRunner REST endpoint path.
You can override these values in your Postman environment.
